articles.title: Highguard’s developer reportedly lays off ‘most’ of its staff just over two weeks after launch
articles.description: Highguard, a new multiplayer shooter from developers who worked on games like Apex Legends and Call of Duty, launched just over two weeks ago, but developer Wildlight Entertainment is already cutting jobs at the company, according to posts from affected staffers on LinkedIn. Former Wildlight level designer Alex Graner says that "most of the team […]
articles.author: Jay Peters
